alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued August 07 at 6:19PM EDT until August 07 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Buffalo has issued a * Tornado Warning for... East central Jefferson County in central New York... North central Lewis County in central New York... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 619 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Carthage, or 8 miles southeast of Fort Drum, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Fort Drum, Carthage, West Carthage, Herrings, Philadelphia, Antwerp, Deferiet, Great Bend, Lake Bonaparte, and Natural Bridge. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
